title: Ticket #392: Print condensed info about a subset of nodes
description: Miron wants us to be able to designate a log file that gets a greatly simplified version of what's now in dagman.out. (Up to this point, it's very similar to what we need to do for the jobstate.log file for Pegasus.) The difference from jobstate.log is that Miron wants the user to be able to designate certain nodes as "important", and only those nodes would have information in this special log file. (The log file would be designed for a human, as opposed to jobstate.log, which is really designed for Pegasus to parse.)
remarks:
2009-May-05 13:57:37 by psilord:
Is there any reason we couldn't write a tool which parses a log file and emits the information necessary in the right format?
